Work Experience

Consultant

Maggie's Light FoundationJuly 2013 - March 2014 | Baltimore, MD

  • Designed and developed a dynamic web application, using Ruby on Rails, that connects developmentally disabled children with student caregivers in relevant fields of study that are interested in real-world experience.
  • Re-built the organization's WordPress main site.

Web and Database Developer

The Jacob France InstituteSeptember 2013 - January 2014 | Baltimore, MD

  • Performed ETL techniques across multiple agencies and data formats in a state government program assessment totaling 30,000 records.
  • Developed a web scraper to extract all the foreclosure records for a given county and year from the Maryland Judiciary Case Search website.

Program Assistant

Center for Entrepreneurship and InnovationAugust 2012 - June 2013 | Baltimore, MD

  • Participated in preparation for the Startup Maryland Bus Tour - a campus rally and pitch competition - resulting in over 50 business case submissions and $2000 being distributed.
  • Helped coordinate the university's first marketplace, the Student Bee'Zaar, where goods and services can be offered by student business owners.
  • Administrated the organization's website content management system, OU Campus. Posted updates to current events and created static pages.
Education

Bachelor of Science, Information Systems and Technology ManagementAugust 2011 - January 2013 | Baltimore, MD

University of Baltimore

Honors, Awards, Achievements:
  • Graduated Magna Cum Laude
  • President, Entrepreneurship Club Fall 2012
  • Vice President, Marketing Club Spring 2011
  • Founding Member of university's chapter, Sigma Nu Tau, National Entrepreneuship Honor Society
  • Member, Beta Gamma Sigma, National Business Honor Society
  • Scholarship Winner of 'Inspired Discoveries' research competition with Direct Mail Efficacy via Statistical Analysis
Technical Skills
